name: 产品满意度调查
creator: SurveyJS0
data: {"locale":"zh-cn","pages":[{"name":"page1","elements":[{"type":"radiogroup","name":"satisfaction","title":{"default":"How would you describe your experience with our product?","zh-cn":"您对我们产品的满意度如何？"},"isRequired":true,"choices":[{"value":"1","text":"非常不满意"},{"value":2,"text":"有点不满意"},{"value":3,"text":"中立"},{"value":4,"text":"大体满意"},{"value":5,"text":"很满意"}]}]},{"name":"page2","elements":[{"type":"comment","name":"suggestion","title":{"default":"What can we do to make your experience more satisfying?","zh-cn":"您对我们的产品改进有什么建议？"}},{"type":"rating","name":"nps-score","title":{"default":"On a scale of zero to ten, how likely are you to recommend our product to a friend or colleague?","zh-cn":"您有多大可能向他人推荐我们的产品？"},"rateMin":0,"rateMax":10}]},{"name":"page3","elements":[{"type":"comment","name":"how-can-we-improve","title":"In your opinion, how could we improve our product?"}]},{"name":"page4","elements":[{"type":"comment","name":"disappointing-experience","title":"Please let us know why you had such a disappointing experience with our product"}]}],"mode":"display"}
